name: TableAnxiety
description: Table Anxiety is a VR Game made for a 48 hour interactive experience game jam with the theme of "What is reality?". The main concept of the game is to build the player's anxiety through twisting the expected consequence of interacting with everyday objects.  It uses a combination of mechanics and sound effects (background, spacial, & activated sounds) to build anxiety in the player and make them question how the world will react to their actions.
